name: RN apps: File preview - Delete file cache

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Update notes: Linda 22 Aug 2022: Added RN_Smoke_Tests label during test case cleanup.

inline.description:
File preview - Delete file cache
————————————————————————————
  1. Ensure you have downloaded a file such as a video or document in order to preview it
  2. Verify that if you tap the file to preview, it does not download it again; it just shows the preview
  3. Go to right-hand three-dot menu ➜ Settings ➜ Advanced Settings
inline.expectedResult: • Cache amount should show approx 58KB (after app restarts you're returned to Town Square so loading the channel adds a few KB)

inline.description:
1. Tap Delete Documents & Data, tap Delete to confirm verify file cache displays as `0 B`
  2. Go back to the file you had downloaded and previewed, and tap to preview it again
inline.expectedResult: • It should download the file (or ask to) again before displaying the preview

customFields.Related ticket(s): RN - iOS image previews don't work after using Delete File Cache — MM-13673
